header.title: Jesse Clark
header.subtitle: Building high-performing teams and delivering exceptional user experiences

content.text: Level 99 Product Leader with over a decade of experience building and scaling innovative software products. Specializing in user-centered experiences that delight customers and drive business results.

content.title: Main Quests Completed
items: Led GameStop's search platform optimization (+40% relevancy)
Architected cross-platform digital experiences at Target
Launched innovative fintech solutions at Capital One

content.title: Origin Story
content.text: Started coding journey with QBasic in Western Massachusetts, leveled up with Computer Science at UMass Amherst, gained rare items through GE's Leadership Program, and acquired MBA power-up from UNC Chapel Hill.

sideQuests.title: Side Quests
sideQuests.content: Currently serving as Chair of Deep Run High School's CIT Advisory board, mentoring future tech leaders and contributing to STEM education initiatives.

work.title: Quest Log
work.description: A chronicle of epic missions and achievements

projects.title: GameStop Search Revolution
projects.description: Led the complete overhaul of GameStop's search and discovery platform, enhancing the digital shopping experience for millions of gamers.

projects.title: Digital Transformation Saga
projects.description: Orchestrated digital transformation initiatives that revolutionized internal processes and customer experiences.
